Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System Ertapenem (0.25-32 µg/mL) Gram Negative ID/AST or AST
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Isolates from pure culture of gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System addition of ertapenem for AST panels for gram-negative bacterial isolates
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of most gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria (Enterobacteriaceae and Non-Enterobacteriaceae) and most gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) from pure culture using ertapenem at 0.25-32 µg/mL in Phoenix panels
